appTypeDesc.agentType: The application should be able to generate standard SSO requests and process responses sent by the identity provider. The supported standards are SAML2 Web SSO, OpenID Connect, and WS-Federation (Passive). For more information, see the
appTypeDesc.proxyType: The application does not need to handle the SSO requests and responses. There is a central gateway provided that acts as a proxy for the application and handles SSO requests/responses on behalf of the application. This sends a signed JWT token to the application. For more information, see the
appTypeDesc.shortcut: A direct hyperlink to the application (without enforcing any authentication). This type can be used for web sites, applications having their own authentications etc, but those should get listed in a central place along with all the other apps. For more information, see the
